about_the_game:
This is my first game. I hope you enjoy it.

Story:

Your name is Jennifer, 24 -year old- returning home after studying abroad for a couple of years.

Eager to reconnect, you and your sister Veronica have rented a house in the woods. Veronica will be coming tomorrow morning, you arrive at night after the flight.

Features:

  • First-person Perspective: Immerse yourself completely in the unsettling world as you explore through the eyes of the protagonist.
  • Environmental Interaction: Interact with certain objects and complete basic objectives to progress the story.
  • Atmospheric Graphics: Explore a place in oppressive darkness, where what you can't see is often more terrifying than what you can.

content_descriptors.notes: Not suitable for people sensitive to themes of horror, fear.
